BVT121.Description: BVT121(800x480) Multimedia Display.It launched in 2008, is the first paragraph SHBST high-end multimedia display solutions, are mainly exported to Asia, Africa and France.

BVT151.Description: BVT151(1024x768) Multimedia Display.It launched in 2011, is the first paragraph SHBST high-end multimedia display solutions, are mainly exported to Asia, Africa and France.
